title: Amish Love Letters
description: Joy has been a tom-boy, playing hockey with the boys all her life.When she gets a letter from a secret admirer, Joy suddenly sheds her hockey gear and trades it for dresses and baking pies. Her best friend, Jordan, can't understand the changes in Joy, and isn't convinced he likes them, especially since it causes him to look at her differently. Will Joy's secret admirer make trouble for them and change their friendship forever? What extreme lengths is Jordan willing to go to in order to preserve their friendship, and push the secret admirer out of the picture? Find out in this bittersweet tale of love and friendship.
author: Samantha Bayarr
